content: awesome, well rounded app
Excellent resource, however I am only able to input whole numbers into the calculator.
replyContent: Well, I will take that into the consideration but the fema pros would say, "we're not making cabinets" whole inches are fine for vertical shore take off dimensions as the difference will be made up in the wedge tightening system. I do appreciate the feedback.

content: This app worked great on the Samsung Galaxy S5, even used it on a few incidents. Now that I've upgraded to an S7 it will not work.

Thanks George,

content: Good app
A must have for any tech rescue team. All information is up to current practices.

content: Great app, but will not work now with marshmallow update.

If you aren't actively connected to a network so the app can check licenses before it opens then it will refuse to open. This is odd to me considering it isn't a subscription but a once and done purchase. I bought this for a quick reference but now cannot use it in the backcountry if there is no signal. This should be fixed, until then I feel I've wasted my money.
replyContent: We got rid of that stupid bit of code. The ED 5 update worrks without a data connection!!

content: I look at this app frequently. Helps to stay sharp on the multiple diciplines of specialized rescue.   Had this app previously on an iphone4. Bought a Samsung S6 and Tom was kind enough to help me transfer the app to my new phone. Works great! Great customer service! Thanks!
With the last update, the app is now working again Lollipop.  Great reference tool!
replyContent: Thanks Sergio.

content: Lots of great information packed into one great app. Thanks for fixing it in 1.3 so I can reference it again!
replyContent: Update is done and should be up any day. Sorry for the long delay. This was a tricky problem for some reason and we wanted the update to be solid.

content: Tech rescue
Easy to use. If you don't have your book handy, the phone application is a great alternative.
We have been using the pocket version for several years and the app is a nice complement. Not sure why the DRR website lists the app for $19.99 when Google Store sells it for $9.99. Worth the money.
replyContent:
The $19.95 on the app promo page is a special offer the the actual pocket guide which normally sells for $24 95. Some people who buy the app also want to get the printed version. I will clarify that on the site. Thanks for the heads up.

Tom

content: This is a great app that covers all the special ops disciplines in detail, highly recommended.

This is a great app. I have referenced this on numerous calls. Gives you everything you need to get the job done right. Customer service by Tom is a 10! I love this app and recommend it to everybody to buy!!!!
A few bugs but good
It keeps freezing when I try to open different areas
Can't change pages. It keeps on freezing when i try. Please fix.
replyContent:
The freezing is fixed! The DRR Rescue app is now functioning normally. With over 3000 android devices out there, its tough to catch all the potential conflicts with particular devices. We are working on them as we become aware of them. The DRR rescue app is full of useful stuff and more is on the way. 

Thanks for the heads up!

DRR Rescue
